channel.title: Cthulhu Dark/Delta Green: M-Cell Operations
channel.description:
![5f591e528f6a1f43|690x499](upload://ue415TfVsxDhsu0NiSiOevuYGaj.jpeg)
M-Cell Operations is a short campaign featuring the two Delta Green scenarios “A Victim of the Art” and “Night Floors” written by Dennis Detwiller and we are using Cthulhu Dark, a rules lite RPG by Graham Walmsley.
You are playing agents of a conspiracy inside the US government sometimes referred to as “Delta Green” or simply called “The Program”. Its goal is to contain or eliminate unnatural and alien threats and to prevent information about them from leaking to the public.
This event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
There will be 3 sessions in total. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
The game may contain themes of violence, gore, paranoia and mental illness.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg) will be in use.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbI9mc2s8cxRH0yKNS8 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbIA4lcsk-gNAq3BFvh https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbIAPLAjPAXMTMvs7as

item.title: Cthulhu Dark/Delta Green: M-Cell Operations
item.dc:creator: @Gerrit
item.description:
@Gerrit wrote:

That’s what Cthulhu Dark feels for me, too. Insight just sums it up so precisely. I can probably only make it to one session. But I’m in.

Read full topic

item.title: Cthulhu Dark/Delta Green: M-Cell Operations
item.dc:creator: @HorstWurst
item.description:
@HorstWurst wrote:

Glad you share my passion for Delta Green!
As a system it is a bit too granular for my taste, but as a setting it kicks ass! Cthulhu Dark on the other hand is like throwing CoC in a furnace until everything unnecessary has been burned away and only its beautiful core remains.

Read full topic

item.title: Cthulhu Dark/Delta Green: M-Cell Operations
item.dc:creator: @Kevthulhu
item.description:
@Kevthulhu wrote:

I’m very excited for this group of sessions! You’re mashing up 2 of my favorites - a great game system with one of my favorite settings!

Read full topic
